subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] The Worldwide Radio Sweep EVP Alliance on Face Book
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I don't know if I was successful in creating a Facebook account. Technology
hates me.

 F-S

On Thu, Sep 16, 2010 at 9:27 AM, f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...> wrote:

>
>
> Hello everyone. I have created a Face Book titled "The Worldwide Radio
> Sweep EVP Alliance" with intent to create a fan base for our cause, a place
> where newcomers can access our yahoo sites from the wall or discussions
> view, and through fan base membership get a feeling for how many of us
> actually exist worldwide.
>
> In conversation with many FB friends, mostly of the paranormal
> investigation group, most of these groups do not believe in nor use Radio
> Sweep technology during their investigations.
>
> Paranormal meetup groups around the country are popping up with intent to
> teach the general public how to perform an investigation using cameras and
> recorders, but again they tend to leave out Radio Sweep as a usable device.
>
> We have a valuable tool that we know can and does bring in paranormal
> messages, but I am in belief that these paranormal groups as well as the
> likes of AAEVP or like organizations are keeping our work hidden away from
> individuals that would benefit from it, as well as have the intelect and
> electronic backgrounds to get in the trenches with us to move our work into
> mainstream.
>
> Setting up this alliance fan page is a start, and I welcome each of you to
> join and post your web pages under discussion, so any newcomers can join
> your groups and perhaps become part of our cause.
>
>
> http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=102193593178906&v=app_2373072738&ref=mf#
> !/group.php?gid=102193593178906&v=wall&ref=mf
>
> Michael Edwards SDWR.
>
> 
>

I don' know i I was success ul in c ea ing a Facebook accoun . Technology ha es me.
 
 F-S
